chat.welcomeMessage: Your AI council is ready. What decision can we help with?

chat.councilDebateHint: 5 AI advisors will debate your question and synthesize the best answer
chat.startNewChat: Start a new conversation to get started

tooltips.company: Choose which company's context to use

descriptions.balanced: Default settings for most use cases

sidebar.startNewConversation: Start a new conversation to ask your council

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteAccountWarning: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
settings.bioPlaceholder: Tell us about yourself or your business...
settings.removeApiKeyConfirm: Remove your OpenRouter API key? You will use the system key with usage limits.
settings.aiProviderDescription: AxCouncil uses AI models to power the council. Connect your own API key to have full control over costs — you only pay for what you use, directly to the provider.
settings.openRouterTagline: Access all major AI models through one API
settings.whatIsOpenRouterDesc: OpenRouter is a service that gives you access to all the major AI models (like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and more) through a single account. Instead of signing up separately with OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc., you just need one OpenRouter account.
settings.openRouterAnalogy: Think of it like a phone plan that lets you call any network — OpenRouter lets you use any AI model without managing multiple subscriptions.
settings.billingExplainer: You only pay for what you use. There are no monthly fees or subscriptions. Each time the council runs, it costs a small amount (typically a few cents) which is charged directly to your OpenRouter account.
settings.billingNote: AxCouncil does not charge you for AI usage — all costs go directly to OpenRouter at their published rates. You can set spending limits on your OpenRouter account to stay in control.
settings.keySecurityNote: Yes. Your API key is encrypted before being stored and is only ever decrypted on our secure servers when making AI requests. We never log or expose your full key.
settings.howToGetKey: How to get your OpenRouter API key
settings.step1Desc: Go to openrouter.ai and sign up for a free account. You can use Google, GitHub, or email.
settings.step2Desc: Go to Credits and add funds. Start with $5-10 to try it out — this will last for many council sessions.
settings.step3Desc: Go to API Keys and click "Create API Key". Give it a name like "AxCouncil" and optionally set a spending limit.
settings.step4Title: Copy and paste your key below
settings.step4Desc: Your key will look like sk-or-v1-... — paste it in the field below and we'll verify it works.
settings.keyEncrypted: Your key is encrypted and stored securely
settings.usageDescription: Your council queries this billing period
settings.manageSubscriptionDesc: Update payment method, view invoices, or cancel
settings.userMustExist: User must have an existing account to be added.
settings.devWarning: Developer settings are for testing only. Changes affect your session.
settings.mockModeDesc: Use simulated AI responses instead of real API calls
settings.mockModeOn: Using simulated responses — no API costs
settings.mockModeOff: Using real API calls — credits will be consumed
settings.mockModeActive: Mock mode active. No tokens will be consumed during this session.
settings.promptCachingDesc: Cache prompts to reduce costs (Claude, GPT & DeepSeek)
settings.cachingOn: Caching ON — reduces costs by caching context
settings.tokenUsageDesc: Show detailed token counts per stage during council sessions
settings.tokenUsageOn: Showing tokens, cost estimates, and cache hits per stage
settings.tokenUsageInfo: Token usage will be displayed below each council stage.

stages.evaluationError: An error occurred while generating the evaluation.
stages.saveFailed: Couldn't save that. Let's try again.
stages.tagDepartments: Tag this answer with relevant departments
stages.saveToProjectHint: Save this answer and add it to your project
stages.saveAsTypeHint: Save as {{type}} to your knowledge base
stages.saveAnswerHint: Save this answer to access it later from My Company
stages.costTooltip: Estimated cost for this council deliberation
stages.rankTooltip: Avg score: {{avg}} ({{votesReceived}}/{{totalVoters}} experts voted) — Lower is better
stages.rankTooltipFull: {{fullName}} - Average rank: {{avg}} ({{votesReceived}} of {{totalVoters}} experts voted). Lower is better - #1 is the top answer.
stages.synthesisError: An error occurred while generating the synthesis.
stages.optionallyClassify: Optionally classify as a playbook type
stages.saveWithoutProject: Save without linking to a project
stages.linkToProject: Link this answer to a project for easy access later

modals.deleteConversationWarning: This action cannot be undone. The conversation will be permanently deleted.
modals.aiIntro: Just describe your project - AI will structure it beautifully

modals.companyContextDesc: This context is injected into every AI Council conversation.
modals.companyContextPlaceholder:
Enter your company context here...

Include:
- Mission and vision
- Company stage and goals
- Budget and constraints
- Key decisions and policies
- Team structure
- Any other important context for the AI Council
modals.noCompanyContext: No company context yet. Click Edit to add context.

modals.aiIntroDepartment: Describe your department and AI will structure it
modals.departmentPlaceholderAI: E.g., "A team that handles customer complaints and ensures satisfaction..." or "Engineering team focused on mobile apps"
modals.suggestedRolesHint: You can add these roles after creating the department
modals.departmentReady: Your department is ready. Add roles to get started.
modals.aiIntroRole: Describe the role and AI will structure it
modals.rolePlaceholderAI: E.g., "Someone who writes code, reviews PRs, and mentors junior developers" or "Customer support lead who handles escalations"
modals.responsibilitiesHint: These are displayed for reference only
modals.roleReady: Your role is ready. You can now assign it to team members.
modals.aiPersonalityPlaceholder: How this role should behave as an AI advisor...
modals.aiPersonalityHint: Defines how this role behaves when acting as an AI advisor in the council
modals.aiIntroPlaybook: Describe your playbook and AI will structure it
modals.playbookPlaceholderAI: E.g., "How to onboard new engineers" or "Our code review policy" or "Decision-making framework for product priorities"
modals.playbookNeedsTitleAndContent: Playbook needs a title and content
modals.aiWillDetermineType: AI will determine the best type from your description
modals.playbookReady: Your playbook is ready to use.
modals.aiIntroContext: Describe your company and AI will create a comprehensive context document
modals.contextPlaceholderAI: E.g., "We're a B2B SaaS startup building productivity tools. Team of 8, seed-funded, focused on launching MVP this quarter. We value speed over perfection and async communication..."
modals.aiStructuringContext: AI is creating your company context...

stages.creativityHint: Creativity controls how predictable or varied the AI's responses are. Lower values give consistent, focused answers. Higher values allow more originality and unexpected ideas.

llmHub.allModelsUsed: All available models are already in use

conservative.label: Conservative
conservative.desc: Predictable, factual responses. Best for compliance, legal, and data analysis.

balanced.label: Balanced
balanced.desc: Our recommended default. Reliable yet flexible for everyday business tasks.

creative.label: Creative
creative.desc: More varied responses. Great for brainstorming, marketing, and content creation.

stage3.label: Final Answer
stage3.hint: Best insights combined into one response

chairman.hint: Final answer in Council mode, or your Single AI model

mycompany.businessContextDesc: This document defines your company's mission, goals, constraints, and strategic decisions. When selected, it's injected into Council conversations to provide relevant, contextual advice.
mycompany.noContextHint: Describe your company in plain English. AI will turn it into a context document that helps advisors give you better, more relevant advice.
mycompany.projectsHelp: Projects help you organize related decisions and give your council persistent context across sessions.
mycompany.teamHelp: Add departments and roles to help your council understand your organization
mycompany.playbooksHelp: Create SOPs, frameworks, and policies that your AI council will reference
mycompany.decisionsHelp: Past decisions and insights from council sessions will appear here for reference.
mycompany.activityHelp: Your team's activity will show up as you use the council, save decisions, and build playbooks.
mycompany.usageHelp: Council usage metrics and trends will appear here
mycompany.noPendingDecisions: No pending decisions to review. Save council outputs to see them here.
mycompany.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your search or department filter.
mycompany.startSessionForAnalytics: Start a council session to see usage analytics

mycompany.modelUsageEmpty: Model usage will appear here after your first council session.
